website_summaries.verdict: Once you get past the break in period, you'll have yourself a great-looking boot that can handle whatever winter throws at it.
pros: Available in dark brown or black
Easy to pull on, take off
Warm, dry, and offers a good grip on ice or snow
cons: The break in period can be a little long and can involve discomfort and squeaking when you walk

customer_reviews.title: Best boot EVER! lasted me over 2 yrs working with concrete
customer_reviews.text: Best boots ever. I know these are not "work" boots but I decided to buy them for work. I work construction standing in concrete all day every day and these lasted me over 2 years (bought these April 2016). They are finally on about ready to fall apart so I will be buying another pair as soon as they come back in stock in my size. Most of the other guys I work with buy red wing's for $200+ and are lucky to get 1 year out of them.
customer_reviews.author: lexilouTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great boot great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot and awesome price. Broke them in over a few hours in the house and now they are very comfy. Just bought mink oil to protect and waterproof the leather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boot, but definitely get some insoles for it
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 13 shoes in EEE width so when I saw that the boot that I was looking at was a 13M, I was a bit concerned that it might be too narrow for me. I read a few reviews that mentioned that this boot was wider than you might expect and that was exactly what I found. It fits the width of my foot just right. Arch support and the inner foot surface of these boots is not all that great, so I highly recommend getting a good insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, comfortable boots.
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed by how comfortable these boots are. The construction is a little uneven (stitching showing in places, different sized openings--see photos), but that gives a not unpleasant hand-made feel to them. I get footwear a size bigger so my toes don't get crushed. Did that with these boots too and they fit as expected or maybe just a bit larger, but since I intend to wear these with thick socks it worked out perfectly. I normally expect boots to hurt my sensitive feet. These do not. Very comfortable! 4 and a half stars.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Paeper

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a cheap pair of shoes for 3x the price.
customer_reviews.text: After a day of trying these out I have to say these are terrible shoes. There is no support, no padding, and are tight on the ball of the foot. However the heel feels like im wearing flip flops, without padding they slip as I walk along my heel while squishing my upper foot and ball area. I have paid 5x less for a pair of shoes that were more comfortable than these. I am returning them and will second guess buying this brand at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Taylor

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for around $60 here. I have owned Skechers before ad was surprised at how fast they wore out, but for the price I figured these were worth a shot. I am still breaking them in, but here are first impressions: Fit is a little weird - tight around ankle, loose in the heel. No support, these would be murder to stand/walk in much. I am using new insoles. The insoles that came in the boots I did not remove, but I didn't try to do that very hard. They seem glued in pretty well. They look ok and make me 1" taller.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: What a great pair of boots! Easy to take on and off, and they stay snug on your foot while walking. I've been looking for a pair of boots like this for a while and I'm glad I purchased these. The factory photo shows some scuffed up looking boots, but the ones I had were slightly dark and not scuffed. I added some mink oil for protection, and the color got a little darker and richer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are a hard fit for most boots...Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite boots. I wear them casually and love the fit and comfort. I'm a hard fit in boots due to my unusually high instep that prevents me from being able to get my foot into higher top pull on boots. (I generally have to have side zip to get on) These fit exceptionally well since broken in. (Initially tight across top of arch) These are well made and so comfortable without having to insert the typical sole cushions or additional arch support.
customer_reviews.author: P. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness!! My husband Is very hard to buy shoes for. I bought these for him after trying countless others, and honestly thought I again would have to send them back like I had to do with others. BUT guess what... He loves them!!! They were a snug fit to get on at first but he was able to get them on. Wore them around the house for about 30 minutes and said that he liked the way they feel. Weeks later...He loves them even more!! They have molded to his feet. So Happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee H

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Awesome Boot from Sketcher's for Goodness Sake!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey all you "boot" manufactures ~ you'd better take note! I'm here to tell you, Y'all ain't nothing on these boots! I am a welder contractor and boots are short lived in my arena. I decided to back off my $190 boots and take a risk on some "throw away" boots. Whoa ~ These things kick A and man they are super comfortable. I bought a second pair because every time I find a pair of nice dogs they seem to go away. These are worth it! Can't beat these for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots but......
customer_reviews.text: I have wider feet and usually get a EE. So maybe the issues with the break in period are due to that. I must say that now I love these shoes and they are very comfortable now that they are broken in. It took about a month for the brake in period and they caused a lot of foot pain until then. The leather seam that goes across the top of the foot would cut off circulation and was not very comfortable. I would buy another pair if I thought I could handle the break in period again.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots, Nice Looking, Price Isn't Bad
customer_reviews.text: They're really nice looking boots. The price isn't bad either. My first pair only last about 2.5 years with proper care. Get some beeswax/pine tar to keep the boots in nice shape. It'll darken them but they still look brown and they still look nice. It's a good balance between rugged and clean looking. Breaking them in with wool or thick socks is not advised. It will hurt. Takes about 2 weeks to break in. The only thing I'd change (other than the durability) is the insert. It doesn't have a removable insert unfortunately and laying one over top would make the inside too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyCoconutTree

customer_reviews.title: Love them, get a size smaller then normal though!
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots wear them almost everyday durning jean temps. Got a pair last October in my normal 13, the were a bit loose and only got looser a as months went on. They did have cracks in the sealing strip between the leather a rubber soul by late, late spring. This time I got size 12 bc they didn’t 12.5 and the fit great not tight, just right and they’ll loosen up so get a size smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Small But Possibly My Fault
customer_reviews.text: I marked this as slightly small but it could have been my fault. All my other Skechers are 11.5M and this was 11.5D(M). The length was perfect but the width was JUST that bit tighter than all my other Skechers, enough to be uncomfortable and i couldn't see it stretching with wear... Size aside, they looked great, felt solid and i feel like i'm missing out that they don't have these boots in 11.5M
customer_reviews.author: CaffineFreeJAVA

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new pair of these every year. On my third pair. I feel like I could probably get two or three years out of them but I am kind of hard on shoes and I need something that looks new most days and after a year of wearing them almost daily any shoe will get scuffed up. They feel as comfortable as an athletic shoe, are very stable on slippery surfaces, and look good enough to wear both casually and in a business environment. Attaching photos of what they look like after a year of daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: No customer service!
customer_reviews.text: When I followed the sizing table and tried to order, it switched the width. Which made it to way to tight. I tried to get It corrected??? also didn't like paying return shipping when it wasn't my error. The boots looked like they would have been nice, that's why I gave 2 stars. I just couldn't keep ordering and paying return shipping. There was NO customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Visnesky

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 in womens so I have enough room for insoles. (I have a high arch) So deciding what size to order in mens was a bit of a challenge. I read a lot of reviews on sizing and decided to go with a size 9. It is the perfect fit when adding my insoles. They are my new favorite short boot! There was no "break in" time. Comfortable right out of the box. They are affordable, very nice quality (sturdy) and lightweight to wear. Easy to pull on and take off. I will not hesitate to buy another pair. So glad I decided to give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be More Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had tried similar types of boots before, but they either slipped or I could not get them on and off my feet. These are perfect for the purpose that I bought them. I recently wore them on a week-long business trip that included 3 airports, 2 tours of large manufacturing facilities, and 2 days in a corporate office; they were safe, comfortable, and fit in everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: gscdrummer

customer_reviews.title: good fit, true to size for me. more of a casual boot.
customer_reviews.text: these have good fit & true to size for me. at 9.5 like most brands I buy. it is more of a casual boot but I have been using it for outside work. definitely not what its designed for. the insole is thin as paper and feels it. tight on the top of my foot if I try thicker insoles. I rubbed them with mink oil and they have been very waterproof so far. will buy a dedicated pair of work boots and save these for more casual outings.
customer_reviews.author: brooks

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fit are on target.
customer_reviews.text: These are my work boots. I use them in a shop environment. Welding, mechanical, petroleum products, they are very durable, and NO SLIP soles. They clean up nicely too. Kiwi shoe polish does wonders when you beat these shoes up at work. The heels seem to wear a little quicker than regular work boots due to the softer material and I am a caveman. But these aren't really work boots. Overall, I am 100% satisfied and will buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Frontline

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable good looking boots
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice boot for both work or casual dress. I thought the brown was too light so I put some polish on them and they ended up being exactly what I wanted. These boots are easy to get on and off without mush effort and are extremely comfortable. I ware hiking socks that have a padded heal/toe and I replaced the thin inner sole with A more comfortable gel insoles. I normally wear size 11 wide and these boots are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Terraed

customer_reviews.title: Really good boot for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty particular about my boots, and I am partial to slip-ons. I had an old pair of Clarks that were great, but didn't want to spend that kind of money on a new pair. This was a really great fit and at a really great price. I've already worn them for full days of yard work and other work, and they have stayed comfortable the entire day. I would certainly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: moriarcj

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, fit as expected and look great
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, fit as expected and look great. Nice solid sole, with out the cluncking sounds of traditional boots when walking on concrete or wood floors (which I personally cant stand for a guy.) These boots are a great on there own and downright amazing considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Work Boot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pairs (Brown & Black). Use them strictly for work. I work for a John Deere dealership in Katy TX, and I am constantly using tractors, construction equipment, dust and grease and oil and fuel spills everywhere in the Service Department. These boots are holding out. They feel great, I just wish they had better ankle support. Really happy with this purchase. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but color doesn't match pictures.
customer_reviews.text: These seem like really well made boots for the price. I got the brown and they don't match the pictures as others have noted...not distressed and darker. After oiling them they get even darker. I would have preferred black but not for the $30 more they wanted. I wear anywhere from 10-11 in boots so went with the 10.5 and they fit perfect. Time will tell how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Davidd

customer_reviews.title: Wear Them Everyday
customer_reviews.text: My feet are narrow and most shoes come in wide widths. These work shoes fit about as good as could be expected. However, I do use some inserts as these shoes have almost no arch support. For shoes that are easy to get on and off and are comfortable these are great. I wear them everyday. We'll see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love Skechers and was not disappointed with these boots. I was a little amused when they arrived as they were scuffed exactly like the picture in the ad. A little boot polish and elbow grease and they turned beautiful. The fit is perfect. I use them for riding my motorcycle and they are just right. Not too bulky or heavy but offer good protection. I will consider ordering a pair in black should they come available.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce V

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable at a really great price point.
customer_reviews.text: I've had less comfortable boots at twice the price. I'm GenX so I've been wearing sketches since the late 90's, and i was happy to see they came out with a no lace boot, with a heel. If they hold up for the winter I'm gonna buy 2 or 3 more because every time I get a favorite shoe they discontinue it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great.  Runs slightly large.
customer_reviews.text: Rugged, comfortable boot, easy on, easy off. Takes a week or so to break in. The leather is very thick. Runs slightly large in my estimation but getting better as it breaks in. I added insoles which made the boot uncomfortably tight - then I tried adding just a pair of gel heel pads which work perfectly to snug up the fit slightly as well as a providing a modest heel lift.
customer_reviews.author: T.M. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: A little loose around the ankle but I expected it to be. I wear a size 13 so the opening has to be big so i can get my foot in it. Fit well for a slip on and are pretty easy to slip on and off. I got them to wear around in the yard working so I can easily kick them on and off. Great shoe for my purposes
customer_reviews.author: windowshopper

customer_reviews.title: Very good boots
customer_reviews.text: This are probably the best boots I’ve ever had. About 2 years ago I started looking for a good looking, durable, comfortable pair of boots. In these 2 years I went through 3 other boots that disappointed 100%. Some time ago I found this one, and they are perfect! I’ve been using them almost on a daily basis and it’s as good as new. If you’re looking for good, comfortable, durable boots and you think this one is good looking, go ahead and buy them. If you don’t like the look of this one, look for others of the same brand cause they’ll probably be very good too!
customer_reviews.author: Calixto Said

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Hold Up Well for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I like these so far. As other reviews have stated these boots are a pretty good bang for your buck. Are there better, more expensive boots out there? Definitely. But they usually will run you a few hundred dollars. These have held up well after 1 month of use. From the start, they felt a bit loose. However, they gradually tighten and conform to your feet . After that, I have taken them hiking in the middle of the woods , shopping, and events. The leather has broken in nicely and gives them a nice rugged yet stylish look. Adding a bit of wax or mink oil to these will definitely help.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Maneage

customer_reviews.title: Excellent casual boot for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Really great for the price. Comfortable, they look good, they fit right. So far they seem quite durable. I have used them as work boots a number of times that I didn't feel like lacing up my real work boots. I wear these now as my every day casual footwear. Can't beat it for the price. I wish the ankle high part was narrower, but given that mine are size 13, they might be wider than the average.
customer_reviews.author: Whaptor

customer_reviews.title: Bootstrap broke after very few uses
customer_reviews.text: I had all kind of chelsea boots over the last 30 years and never had a bootstrap break. Why can't they use some more durable material for the bootstrap?
customer_reviews.author: Bama Boy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy comfy
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these shoes but I had to return them because they were not what I was looking for (i needed a rain boot). They were super comfy and good looking (sketchers are about my favorite shoes). I will buy them again when I am needing new shoes
customer_reviews.author: NachoForceTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Just Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these for years and literally wore them out before I had to replace them. In fact, it was the soles that wore out first because I walk unevenly. Do yourself a favor and pick up a pair of these if you like the style. I don't wear shoes indoors so when it's time to leave I have to put on shoes last. That means I don't want to sit around tying laces and you don't have to with these. They're good for the lazy and the rushed.
customer_reviews.author: jeragogo

customer_reviews.title: Great Oily leather boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Fits just fine but to my preference, I should it bought it 1/2 size larger. I'm a big fan of oil leather boots because after time of use, I apply baby oil to the leather and automaticaly I get "new boots", and besides, after a short time they star to feel like a "glove" to my feet and adquire a great dark look.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Tried Rockport boots (that were $30 more expensive) before purchasing these .. these are OK to get in and out of (I'm sure it will be easier once they are broken in some) .. and look great under a pair of jeans. The foot bed is pretty comfortable, but I have a bad back so I will always hope for more softer and cushioned foot beds! :)
customer_reviews.author: DUB

customer_reviews.title: Good choice in footwear !!
customer_reviews.text: Rare is the shoe/boot that I can pull on and begin wearing as if I had worn them for months. Finding such a fit in my size 14 has always been a hard task. I like the looks, and especially the feel, and they wear great with jeans or car heart dungarees. I'll see how well the soles wear, and how long the elastic gores hold up to the off and on stretch. The fit is good enough to avoid looseness, but yet maintain firm support. I'm now aware of the SKECHERS band of footwear, to the point that I will first search for other styles available from that brand. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sergeant stew

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Easy to put on/Take off
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally very picky about what I put on my feet. These boots did not disappoint! They are extremely comfortable, and actually keep my feet warm in the cold weather. The fit was almost perfect...perhaps a hair on the loose side, but that's easily remedied with a decent pair of socks. I love how easy they are to put on and take off. I have started wearing these daily instead of my tennis shoes...at least until summer arrives. These are currently my favorite pair of shoes, and I am seriously considering buying a second pair to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: JSteele

customer_reviews.title: second pair
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots I've had a pair for a long time and they are finally starting to look it so purchased another one. would give a 5 star if the heel was just little thicker but I guess if you were a tall person it wouldn't matter. very good looking great with khakis and jeans etc. love me some skechers in general as I have other skecher shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Leather
customer_reviews.text: The description says 100% leather but there is only a small portion of the upper that is leather. the main body of the boot is man made material and it even says so on the tag inside the boot. The 100% line in the ad is deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Steele

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable boot for the price. Usually I'll get Bass but these looked rugged enough to wear around countryside as well as casual enough for going into the office, so picked up a pair as a spare. Am not disappointed, wear them more than any other boot I have. More comfortable than a dress shoe for work, but rugged enough to wear for a ride on the moto.
customer_reviews.author: kaicat

customer_reviews.title: These have become my favorite pair of boots!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I wanted something easy to slip on that were also tough, durable and comfortable. These are perfect. I wear them everywhere. My new favorite pair of boots! Only thing that would make these better is if they had Sketcher memory foam insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, fit okay. The style and color are not at all like the photo so they weren't what I was expecting. Wearing them anyway intending to break them in more and rough them up to get a more distressed look over time. I've always liked the Sketcher brand but I wouldn't buy again or recommend this exact item/style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great boots. only complaint i would have is my ...
customer_reviews.text: great boots. only complaint i would have is my jeans are always getting caught on the tabs and not falling over the boot when i stand up from being seated, or getting in and out of my truck. very minor complaint as its easily fixed. I''d suggest polishing these with some KIwi polish and a brush. it helps soften the leather a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Starrskream Gaming

customer_reviews.title: Pull loops too small, can't use them to pull the boots on!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest issue right now is putting them on. the loops to use to pull them on are way too small. You can't get your finger in there to pull up the boots so you they're useless! Still brand new so can't speak to how they'll hold up. They fit well and feel ok so far once you're able to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great "Quasi" Work Boots
customer_reviews.text: I will buy these again. I've been wearing them for a few months, now. They're holding up nice for quasi work boots. I can wear them on the job sites, and office. Look nice, feel great, extremely comfortable. Really don't look like Skechers, either.
customer_reviews.author: USFSam

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Don't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair of Ariat boots I wore everyday for 18 months. Thought I would try a different brand this time. I should have stayed with the Ariat. The sketchers lasted me 15 days until the soles began to crack and break. The boots fit ok but the soles and inner soles are very thin and not a boot you want to wear everyday. I am returning them and buying another pair of Ariats. Another story of you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: justin huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my BF who works on cars usually out in the rain and was sick of his feet getting soaked. These fixed that problem right up. They have lasted at least 6 months so I'm betting they will go through another rainy season before purchasing another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Pettit

customer_reviews.title: A bit big and long break in period
customer_reviews.text: Require more break in; they are still really stiff! Bigger than expected, even after adding inner soles. Boot is also a little low; I mean it is supposed to be low rise but this one is lower than other brands in similar style. If they ever break in they should feel better. Certainly durable!
customer_reviews.author: C Dunlow

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots.
customer_reviews.text: The look great. Fit wonderful. And are so comfortable I forget I'm wearing boots. Well built but are light on your feet. UPDATE 1/5/19, I just bought a 2nd pair. I loved them that much. However I don't love that Amazon reduced the price a week later by $20 after buying the 1st pair and doesn't price protect me.
customer_reviews.author: ConserviDoug

customer_reviews.title: Tough construction, very convenient slip on/off winter boots.
customer_reviews.text: No messing around with (long) laces that may break. Very practical slip on & off winter boots. Looks built to last. Genuine leather which can get wet in the snow without sustaining hardly any damage. The one winter boot winter you need every winter.
customer_reviews.author: philoguste

customer_reviews.title: These things are like gym shoes for the winter time
customer_reviews.text: Feel like you'll need to run away from a bear in the winter time? Maybe put a bunch of NYC natives to shame with your walking speed? Well look no further, this is the shoe for you. Unlike all of the other boots you see in these selections, this one adds a spring to your step combined with soles that have an amazing grip. It means you're not going to slip & die, and the same force you normally use in other shoes gives you 15% more speed. Now you'll make people in NYC feel slow, and that bear will have a much harder time even though it would still probably catch you.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable and very stylish. Unfortunately I fall between weird sizing for shoes. I can be a 12 with one hand or an 11 with another. These are just a little big. 11 1/2 wouldn't work so these will do. So they're definitely still a 5 out of 5 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots! Use them on Dairy Farm.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really comfortable. I have a hard time finding boots that fit, that are comfortable for 10-12 hours a day, and can handle all the crap at a dairy farm. Great buy for you farmers. Don’t waste your time trying to find good boots locally. Buy these! C
customer_reviews.author: Spensor Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great black boots
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and very good looking. I thought it would be softer on the inside, like other sketcher shoes I have but it doesn't have memory foam inside (which I thought it had, I don't know why because it doesn't say anything about it). Anyway I'm very pleased with the product and I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Penton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots
customer_reviews.text: There’s are fantastic boots for the price. The only issue I have is the top arch is a little tight, but after a few days of being worn they seem to be breaking in perfectly. Will definitely buy these again. Love me some sketchers
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. I’ve been wearing them for a couple weeks and they are comfortable and fit great. They did come a little dry so I needed to condition them and now they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Cote

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible was not leather but some cheap knock off material, worth ⭐️.. rating. Used for less than two months.
customer_reviews.author: odong jeje

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. The price was great. The size was good. I wear a men’s 10.5 and That’s what I ordered. I would say that the fit is good. I’ve got room in the toes. The width was tight but stretched out after a couple of days. Now they fit good, maybe just a hair on the ‘loose’ side. But better a bit loose than a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: M. Prenter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boot and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and found them very comfortable. Use them everyday for work and have held up extremely well. I get a ton of compliments on them and are easy to get on and off. Most of my pant legs will go over the boot even skinny jeans
customer_reviews.author: matthew benz

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these! True to size. I went to an outlet but they did not have these exact boots but one similar. So I got the size right and ordered them here. They are really comfortable. No need to wait to break them in. Stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Udo

customer_reviews.title: Very good and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: As a Oregon sheep farmer wearing these everyday in wet and muddy condition,boots are not waterproof but when well oiled do good job of keeping your feet dry.They stretched out a fare bit but still extremely comfortable.If like me you hate wearing rubber boots all winter these are a sturdy comfortable alternative.👍
customer_reviews.author: Graeme McNamara

customer_reviews.title: These have been my favorite boots. If you get the right size for ...
customer_reviews.text: These have been my favorite boots. If you get the right size for your foot, they will fit like a glove and feel comfortable all day long. I worried about these boots not having laces or straps to tighten when they feel loose, but like I said before, if you get the right size, you won't have to worry about them slipping on or off. I like them so much that, I bought the brown one's too. I rotate them on a weekly basis.
customer_reviews.author: Tigersports

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boot, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and comfort of these boots. Moreover that they slip on easily especially since they have pulls on both front and back. They look good with jeans. Perfect for a muddy off-leash dog park. Mine are brown in 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great flying boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for flying. They look both classy and rugged at the same time, while being flexible and light enough that I can manipulate aircraft rudder pedals with ease. Only problem is the angled part of the shoe digs in to the top of one's foot. Might just be the way they wore in, but it causes very noticeable foot pain if worn on a long day. Hopefully it'll go away as the leather gets softened up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots I have ever used for work! I am a maintenance tech and these boots make it through all the types of work that I do. Very easy on and off! My last boot was a size 11 Wolverine Wellington, so I ordered an 11 in these and fit perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: MS public name

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I can't just buy any shoes it's a gamble buying boots like these online but these boots are amazing they so comfortable and the don't hurt my arch like Normal boots do! Iam buying me another pair next month for work!
customer_reviews.author: Norms

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 11D, I had to return the 11's and tried the 10.5.. Still to big. The 10's fit perfect! Thankful for Amazon's exchange policy!! I really like these boots! They are very comfortable and easy to put on and take off. I wear them for everyday use. They look good, keep my feet dry (I oiled them) and have good traction. I wouldn't use them as a heavy work boot. I don't know how well they will hold up? Time will tell. So far, I am happy with my purchase and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: michael crader

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Just not comfortable yet
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough. Still need to break them in. After wearing them a whole night, My toes and ball of my feet ached. They look nice. I hope to break them in a bit at a time. I bought a half size larger; guess it will be a matter of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Black Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Dark Brown shoe, and the leather is so soft, very comfortable boot, love the brown. HOWEVER, the Black shoes (9.5) are the worst, the heel wore down not that I drag my feet just wore, cracked and very tight. It's too bad I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Just choose the Skechers. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: For dress, work, play, or just chill, Skechers are the BOMB!!!!! These boots are no exception. From the first second when you open the box you can tell they are Skechers. The color, quality fit and finish is exceptional. I usually dont buy shoes on line untill now. I bought two other pairs of boots at the same time. I'm on my way to Kholls to return them right now, and take a wild guess what shoes I'm wearing. Spend a little bit more up front for Skechers quality. You will be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A.

customer_reviews.title: These boots are made for working!!! Good price, good quality, sexy and tough!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pairs, one for work around the farm, and the other for work as a service electrician where I'm in people's homes and have to take my shoes off often. They're easy to take off and put on and oh sooo comfortable. They look good and are easy on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: The color looks different in the picture to me. The picture looks like a lighter brown, almost olive color. The actual boot appears to be a standard medium brown. Not a big deal, just not what I was expecting color wise. Other than that, they fit great and wear well. I use them for outdoor work and they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: p-bass5

customer_reviews.title: Good boots all around. Just wish the bottom had a little more cushion.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. I only have one complaint and that is easily fixed. I will be getting a little more padding for the bottom of the boot. They don't have quite enough cushion for my liking bit aside from that the boots are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, affordable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about 4 months now. Fit is good and plenty comfortable to walk in. They are a bit tough to get on but this may improve as they break in more and this keeps them from slipping off. Removing the shoes is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: TheStrive2Survive

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from the start
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable from the first time I put them on. Have worn them every day for 2 weeks and not a single problem. No breakin period required. Perfect fit, perfect size. Good looking boot that’s not too bulky, yet sturdy enough to be a work boot.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Boot
customer_reviews.text: The back pull-strap broke the first time I used it, but I was thinking about cutting them off because they catch my pants, anyway. The boot itself looks really good. I usually wear a size 10 or 10.5 and went with the 10 here since they are slip-on and I wanted them to be snug. I wear a Dr. Sholl's Tri-Comfort insole with regular socks in these, and they fit well. On cold days I wear wool socks and they are a bit tight. I haven't worn them enough to know how well they will hold up through the winter, but I am happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: n.atha.n

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best boots I have ever bought, got them for work comfort, but I wear them every where. The top of the foot was tight for a few days until the leather loosened up a bit, kind of like a brand new baseball glove, afterwards no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Watts

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep them.
customer_reviews.text: I like them except the heel is a little loose. Took a couple days to get used to that part. Tried down a half size but that was just over all too tight. Wish the foot bed was easily replaceable. Will be keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: They form around your foot
customer_reviews.text: So far ...wonderful. Lets see how long this pair lasts. Do like the fact that when I tried em on for the first time they were a little snug but seemed to form around my foot as they loosened for an excellent fit. More of a relaxed fit . I would re-purchase these boots again.
customer_reviews.author: froogalshoppper

customer_reviews.title: Decent All Around Slip on
customer_reviews.text: These are decent for the price. There's a dropoff fel at the heel. Not sure if they need a better insole insert or what but they get the job done. Easy on, easy off, run around boot that's somewhat worthy for casual dress.
customer_reviews.author: TillyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoe/boot. Recovering from a severe knee injury, thought I would try these. Hoping they would be easy on and off for me. So far I'm still learning about the on part. Wanting to get back in the yard and pasture where I need more than a slip on shoe. So far so good, I'm liking them once I get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Rather surprised by the initial quality of these boots, especially for $55 and from Skechers. Nice leather, easy enough to slip on, but snug enough to not feel like they are flopping around. Purportedly handmade upper, and it looks nice under a pair of carhartt’s.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny 5

customer_reviews.title: 5 star for me
customer_reviews.text: I have a horrible back. It makes a big difference with heel height and strike when walking. These pull on easy and walk easy. For a boot very very comfortable not overy heavy
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Carefully for the style
customer_reviews.text: The fit was spot on. However the style was not the one pictured online. I returned the original pair no problems. Got the 2nd pair and same issue. Call Amazon to advise and returned the second pair... would've loved it if the boots online matched what I received
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd pair of these boots. I like them, they are comfortable, easy to slip on, and they last about a year with daily use. Not by any means waterproof, but they're good for daily use, or work.
customer_reviews.author: Philip451

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking and Fitting
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking boots. Seem true to size. Only thing is the leather seems very dry out of the box. Definitely use some mink oil or similar or they will scuff easily.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stettler

customer_reviews.title: Good boots once broken in.
customer_reviews.text: Once you actually get these on they are very comfortable. I've been wearing them about a week and am still having some trouble getting my feet in them. They're showing signs of breaking in so I'm hoping it will continue to get easier. Overall I am satisfied. The boots were shipped quickly but the packaging was abysmal. Luckily these are leather boots and not fine China.
customer_reviews.author: WrithingRiot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Skechers Blaine Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Skechers Blaine shoe has gone above and beyond my expectations. It was so good I also ordered the black color shoe. I have several boots, but these boots far exceeded my expectations. They are extremely comfortable in walking and do not create excess heat that other boots create while walking or sitting. Recommend these boots for any and all men. Thank you Raj
customer_reviews.author: Raj Sharma

customer_reviews.title: The ratings dont lie. Great, affordable boots.
customer_reviews.text: Really great boots. They're basically ranch boots like my more expensive Ariats, but half the price. I had to go down a full size for them to fit just right. I normally wear 8.5 in sneakers but had to go down to 7.5 for them to fit. Really like how they feel. Very comfy by boot standards. So far so good, lets see how long they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Just got these boots and they are nice. I am a plant manager so I needed a boot that looks nice but built to last. So far very comfortable fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great looks in brown or black.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several pairs of these over the years and when I wear them out, I purchase them again. They're comfortable and they last, and the detailing on the side panels sets them above the similar styles. I've only been disappointed once when a heel loop broke, but since they slip on easily its not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Dbw1964

customer_reviews.title: Solid Boot
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Manalorian cosplay and will actually wear them out day to day, one to scuff them up a bit, but too because they are comfy and solid boots either way
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and no laces so it’s not as difficult to wear... my winter beer belly makes tying laces problematic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The boots came in quickly, and in good condition. They look great, but are slightly snug. Unfortunately it is difficult to buy shoes online. I have a wide foot, and will probably have to stretch these to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Evans

customer_reviews.title: New to slip on boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little tight along mid foot at first, but loosen up pretty quick. Added mink oil and that helped even more. Purchased to travel in cold snow areas. Needed a slip on boot for air travel convenience. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great this is my second pair, still wear the fist pair for kick around , they are getting a little rough looking after 6 years of almost everyday wear for my work, needed a new pair to look a little better, will diffently be thinking about a third pair when the time comes, Just wish they were made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: JIM RIDENOUR

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot ever
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good looking, and sturdy boot. Been using for construction work. More support than expected. In my experience, Skechers run a little wide so the D width fit perfectly for me. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Blaine Orsen Ankle Boot
product_meta.description:
Skechers offers this ruggedly handsome ankle boot for teaming up with jeans, khakis and other casual faves. Constructed with a slightly distressed leather upper, the Blaine Orsen features an easy slip-on design, made even easier with side panels of elastic goring that give the boot a flexible fit and feel. Dual pull tabs help with dressing, while the tough, deep-tread rubber sole provides excellent traction and long-lasting wear.

Skechers is an award-winning global leader in the lifestyle footwear industry that designs, develops, and markets lifestyle footwear that appeals to trend-savvy men, women and children. The company's success stems from it's high quality, diversified, and affordable product line that meets consumers' various lifestyle needs. Since it's inception in 1992, the Skechers diverse product offering has grown from utility style boots to include seven Skechers brands and five uniquely branded fashion lines for men and women.
feature_bullets: Features of this item include: Black Friday - Cyber Monday, Contrast Stitching, Holiday 2016, Twin Gore
